headline: Vessels, undersea cables, and offshore oil installations increasingly becoming “gray zone” targets
summary: LONDON, Dec. 10, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The threat to vessels, undersea cables, and offshore oil installations has increased due to the availability of advanced weapons and the willingness of certain states – particularly Russia and Iran – to disregard international maritime laws. This is just one identified emerging risk from ‘gray zone aggression’, meaning any action used to weaken a country by means short of war, according to the latest Political Risk Index from WTW (NASDAQ: WTW), a leading
